projectGridLines.stationName: Wayfair Global Technology Pvt. Ltd- Search and Recommendations
projectGridLines.title: Title:Software Intern (Search and Recommendations Platform and Services) 2) Title: Software Intern (Search and Recommendations Data Engineering)
projectGridLines.description:
Title:Software Intern (Search and Recommendations Platform and Services)

Description: Intern will focus on building/enhancing features to tools and frameworks

which improve the velocity of enabling better Search and Recommendations

experiences on Wayfair website, mobile app and email channels

Skill sets: Computer Science, Programming in any popular language (Java/python

preferred), Git, Linux/Unix based operating system, SQL

Expected learning: Interns will get hands-on experience in working on real world

projects which incorporate Machine Learning models and solve problems for

engineers, data scientists and analytics that apply these models in S&R space. They

Title: Software Intern (Search and Recommendations Data Engineering)

Description: Build and maintain robust data pipelines that are used by data

science and analytics teams in the search and recommendations organization,

enabling the teams to build, experiment and iterate business and

recommendation logic at speed, scale and quality

Skill sets: Computer science, Big Data systems- Spark/Scala, MPP- BigQuery,

SQL, programming in popular language (python preferred),Git, Linux/Unix based

operating system.

Expected learning: Interns will have hands-on experience by working on real

world problems to build production systems at PB scale using GCP services and

other software tools (for CI/CD and Infra) that cater to millions of wayfairs

customers. They will learn on how the S&R space works within an

e-commerce industry at depth and all about software development lifecycle

using agile methodology.

Specific courses required for project execution: Computer Science

Fundamentals, Big Data, Object Oriented Design, Databases.

will also understand the concepts behind building/maintaining systems which scale to

millions of requests per minute

Specific courses required for project execution: Computer Science Fundamentals,

Object Oriented Design, Operating Systems, Databases

Some Machine Learning course (not required)
